si.title: Dr. Hans Wijayasuriya appointed Chief Advisor to President on Digital Economy
body_lines: Former Axiata Group CEO Dr. Hans Wijayasuriya has been appointed as the Chief Advisor to the President on Digital Economy.
ඔහු අද (01) කොළඹ ජනාධිපති ලේකම් කාර්යාලයේදී ජනාධිපති අනුර කුමාර දිසානායක මහතාගෙන් ඔහුගේ පත්වීම් ලිපිය ලැබුණි.
ජනාධිපති මාධ්ය අංශය (පීඑම්ඩී) කියා සිටියේ මෙම පත්වීම ශ්රී ලංකාවේ ඩිජිටල් ආර්ථිකයක් කරා මාරුවීමේ පළමු පියවරක පළමු පියවරක් බවයි.

ශ්රී ලංකා රජයේ ප්රධාන උපදේශක ධුරයට රටේ ඩිජිටල් ආර්ථික න්යාය පත්රය මෙහෙයවීම සඳහා ආචාර්ය විජයසූරිය මහතාගේ කාර්යභාරය වන ඇක්සියාටා සමූහ බර්හාඩ් මහතා විසින් ශ්රී ලංකා රජය විසින් නියම කරන ලදී.ඩිජිටල් ආර්ථිකය සහ අනෙකුත් ආශ්රිත නායකත්ව භූමිකාවන්.
Dr Wijayasuriya has duly accepted the invitation from the GoSL and has communicated his decision to step down from his role at Axiata Group with effect from 15 January 2025, the announcement said.

“The Board of Directors of Axiata have accepted his decision to relinquish his position from the effective date. During the interim period Dr Wijayasuriya’s responsibilities to Axiata will continue, including the execution of a transition program while he makes himself available for GoSL’s digital transformation initiatives on an advisory and non-executive basis. Axiata will announce any further changes at the appropriate time.”

ආරිකා විජයසූරිය ඇක්සියාටා සහ එහි පූර්වගාමියා සමඟ වසර 30 කට වැඩි කාලයක් වාර්තා කරයි, ටෙලිකොම් මැලේසියාව. A member of Axiata’s Board of Directors in the capacity of Group Executive Director, Dr Wijayasuriya heads the pan-region telecommunications operations of the Group spanning the markets of Malaysia, Indonesia, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka and Cambodia.

ආචාර්ය විජයසූරිය ගෝලීය ජංගම කර්මාන්තයේ පාලක මණ්ඩලය වන ජීඑස්එම්ඒ හි අධ්යක්ෂ මණ්ඩලයේ අධ්යක්ෂ මණ්ඩලයේ සේවය කළේය. තාක්ෂණික කර්මාන්තයේ සක්රීය දායකත්වයක් සපයන්නන් සහ මොබයිල් කර්මාන්තයේ මෙන්ම සංවර්ධන දියුණුවලදී ආචාර්ය විජයසූරිය විසින් 2024 දී ජීඑස්එම්ඒ සභාපතිගේ සම්මානය සමඟ ගෞරවයට පාත්ර වූ අතර එය ගෝලීය ජංගම කර්මාන්තයට කැපී පෙනෙන දායකත්වයක් ලබා දුන්නේය.

ta.title: Dr. ஹான்ஸ் விஜயாசுரியா டிஜிட்டல் பொருளாதாரம் குறித்த ஜனாதிபதியின் தலைமை ஆலோசகராக நியமிக்கப்பட்டார்
body_lines: முன்னாள் ஆக்ஸியாடா குழு தலைமை நிர்வாக அதிகாரி டாக்டர். டிஜிட்டல் பொருளாதாரம் குறித்த ஜனாதிபதியின் தலைமை ஆலோசகராக ஹான்ஸ் விஜயாசுரியா நியமிக்கப்பட்டுள்ளார்.
He received his letter of appointment from President Anura Kumara Dissanayake at the Presidential Secretariat in Colombo today (01).
The President’s Media Division (PMD) stated that the appointment marks a significant first step in Sri Lanka’s transition towards a digital economy.

Axiata Group Berhad on Friday announced that Dr Wijayasuriya will relinquish role as the CEO of Telecommunications Business and Group Executive Director as he has been invited by the Government of Sri Lanka to lead the country’s digital economy agenda in the capacity of Chief Advisor to the President on Digital Economy and other related leadership roles.
Dr Wijayasuriya has duly accepted the invitation from the GoSL and has communicated his decision to step down from his role at Axiata Group with effect from 15 January 2025, the announcement said.

"ஆக்ஸியாடாவின் இயக்குநர்கள் குழு தனது நிலையை பயனுள்ள தேதியிலிருந்து கைவிடுவதற்கான தனது முடிவை ஏற்றுக்கொண்டது. இடைக்கால காலத்தில் டாக்டர் விஜயாசுரியாவின் ஆக்ஸியாட்டாவுக்கு பொறுப்புகள் தொடரும், ஒரு மாற்றம் திட்டத்தை செயல்படுத்துவது உட்பட, அவர் ஒரு ஆலோசனை மற்றும் நிர்வாகமற்ற அடிப்படையில் GOSL இன் டிஜிட்டல் உருமாற்ற முயற்சிகளுக்கு தன்னைக் கிடைக்கச் செய்கிறார். ஆக்சியாடா மேலும் எந்த மாற்றங்களையும் பொருத்தமான நேரத்தில் அறிவிக்கும். ”

டாக்டர் விஜயாசுரியா 30 ஆண்டுகளுக்கும் மேலாக ஆக்ஸியாடா மற்றும் அதன் முன்னோடி டெலிகாம் மலேசியாவுடன் பதிவு செய்கிறார். A member of Axiata’s Board of Directors in the capacity of Group Executive Director, Dr Wijayasuriya heads the pan-region telecommunications operations of the Group spanning the markets of Malaysia, Indonesia, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka and Cambodia.

Dr Wijayasuriya also served on the Board of Directors of the GSMA, the governing body of the global mobile industry. An active contributor and champion of technology as well as developmental advancements in the mobile industry, Dr Wijayasuriya was honoured with the GSMA Chairman’s Award in 2024, the highest recognition by GSMA, for his outstanding contributions to the global mobile industry.
